LanguageData.Entities.label: entities
LanguageData.HoraxCult.label: horax cult
LanguageData.HoraxCult.deityPresets.0.nameType.name: Horax
LanguageData.HoraxCult.ideoDescription: You see space as a grid, pure and mathematical. We know it is only the glassy surface of a black ocean of nightmares buried under every place and every moment. We know the mind who reigns from the deep. Its thoughts reach up from the boiling darkness and reward those who serve its will.
